content.detailedDescription: My friend and i would walk our dogs late at night for a good hour or two over the summer. it was around 1 am and we both walked to our neighborhood's elementary school which happens to be the half way point to both our houses, that's were we split up to each walk home. i was walking my dog home and was pretty close home, just about a block away. i was looking at the sky (which was very very clear) thinking to myself how nice it should be tomorrow. right as i was looking at the sky i saw a rather large disc over head fly by extremely fast. i'd say it was about the size of the average frisbee held above your head at arms length. the whole thing was glowing, the center was more white and bright and as it got to the edges it was more of a mustard yellow. i saw it for a good 2-3 seconds before it disappeared. after seeing that i knew i just saw a ufo and by ufo i mean i knew it wasn't of this earth. i stood there for a good minute thinking to myself what do i do who do i tell. i continued to walk home. after walking about another minute my dog (nicest, calmest, quietest dog, rarely and i mean rarely ever barks) stops walking (and this dog loves to walk). she turns around and starts growling. the hair on her back was standing up she was showing her teeth and everything. this scared the crap out of me. i kept pulling the leash and saying dixie (my dogs name) calm down come on. she then let out a loud vicious bark. then i heard the sound of something speed walking towards us from behind. it sounded like a dogs paws on the pavement. we could not see anything but it was getting louder. my dog suddenly turns around and takes off pulling me. the faster we ran the louder and closer it sounded. i was afraid to turn around to see what was behind me but i did anyway as we ran and saw nothing. i let go of my dogs leash and ran into my backyard and went through my back door into my house. my mom woke up from me running into the house. she asked what was going on because i was out of breath. i tried telling her but she got out of bed and kept accusing me of being on drugs. then my phone started ringing and it was my friend (i had told him to call me when he got home when we left each other) i pick up the phone and started to cry as i tried to tell him what happened. before i'd get to the substantial information, the phone would disconnect. my house has full coverage... i didnt want to call him back because he was using his house phone and i didnt want to wake everyone at his house up. i went back to my moms room to continue to try to tell her what happened. she started to believe me and was getting freaked out herself. my phone started ringing in my room so i went to go answer it knowing it was my friend. as i'd try telling him again, the phone would disconnect. he called me back right away and my mom was screaming for me to come into her room so she can try to make sense of things. i tell my friend to hold on, i left the phone in my room. as  i was trying to tell my mom what happened more in depth, my cell phone started ringing (disconnected while i was talking to my mom and my friend was calling me back) i lost it. i broke down and told my mom every time i tried telling my friend what happened my phone disconnected. she didnt understand. this happened over and over again and i was eventually able to tell him quickly what happened. he was afraid bc he said he was hearing humming outside. he went to sleep in his parents room. we were 15 at the time... i counted how many times my friend called me. he called me 17 times within a half hour period. that means that my phone disconnected 16 times in that half hour period. again, at my house i have full at&t 3g service. i then stood outside my moms and my room and stared down the hallway for a good half hour as if i was hypnotised, not saying it was from "aliens" thats just how scared i was, i didnt want to move. my dog, sat and stared out the back door all night. my mom was just as scared as i was after knowing the whole story and hearing my phone ringing over and over again knowing that i wasnt hanging up the calls, they were disconnecting. my mom was so scared that she made me sleep with my door open, lights and tv on, and she made me take my necklace off in fear that it could be used to choke me. this whole story sounds far fetched i know and my being 15 at the time probably makes this sound silly but i didnt even really believe in aliens at that time. after that incident i've become somewhat obsessed with aliens and ufo's. when i tell friends this story they look at me as if im legitamently mental. i don't care what people think when i tell them this story. i know what happened and i take it to my grave.
content.summary: Large ufo overhead, chased by something on foot?

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on sr-346 (john wayne parkway), and was coming up to honeycutt rd by the high school. i noticed  two orange lights in the sky by side by side, in the southern sky. then a new light appeared to the right of the two lights, and simultaneously the light to the left disappeared. then one second later it repeated the same pattern. the lights lasted approximately 10 seconds and then all the lights just turned off. it looked like the lights were walking across the sky. 

this is not the first time i seen light like this in maricopa. the prior time was in mid december when we had the rain storm. it was just passed 6:00 pm and it was rush hour, i was driving south on sr-347 just south of riggs road and noticed a trail of lights appear in front of me in the sky. there were 6 orange lights in a perfect line across the sky. they were evenly spaced and appeared to be still. they turned on very bright and dimmed down. they did this three times and disappeared. i know they were not far away because they appeared under the clouds, i know more people seen them but i did not see anything in mufon reports or anything in the news paper. i know more people see these lights because i have seen them more than a dozen times in the last 12 months.  i just wish they would report them, so that we can figure out what there objects are.
content.summary: Orange lights moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
January 8, 2011, saturday morning at 9:52am, bright blue sky, no clouds. i was driving west on union avenue and had crossed cooper avenue when i saw overhead a large, white, non-reflective, cigar shaped object moving to the south.  there were 2 youths in my back seat and i asked them if they could see it, too.  they could view the object from the back seat, initially leaning forward and looking out the windshield and then looking out the side passenger window behind me (the driver).

at first glance i thought it to be a commercial jet, however, when i took a second look and asked my passengers to look, we saw there was no tail, no wings, no windows, no markings.  this object was a long cylinder-shaped (cigar) and rounded on both ends.  it was white, but not reflecting the sun at all.  it moved at a steady pace toward the south and slowly began ascending and turning slightly to the south west.  we continued to watch this object, discussing it the entire time, looking for anything that could identify it (ie wings, tail, propeller, windows, colors or markings).  we watched it literally as far as we could see it.  

when we could no longer see the white cigar shaped object we saw in that same area a jet-liner (in the vicinity of the memphis international airport) which showed up black against the blue sky and the wings and tail were quite visible even from the long distance.  i asked my passengers if that looked like the object we all saw and they agreed that the object we saw and discussed was not an airplane.

i turned off union avenue at willett and arrived at my destination.  i estimate that we saw and observed this object for approximately 1 minute to 1 1/2 minutes and the only time we could not see it was when a building obstructed our view.
content.summary: Large white cigar shaped object moving from north to south, ascending and turning to the southwest

content.detailedDescription: Front yard smoking a cigerte/bright light/a plane/flying 100 ft over house and was disc shape/was scared at frist and then felt weak four 6 hrs after seeing it/in sec it was gone/         have videos of ufo ship 50 ft away      they fly every night from 1 am to 530 am here in san jose calif
content.summary: Flying over house

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the kitchen window into the driveway from a row-home in northeast philadelphia when i noticed a twinkle of colored light way up in the sky. as i watched, this object zoomed rapidly toward the ground. as it got closer the more colorful it bacame. it looked like it was on fire but had more colors than a the usual red and yellow. the colors i remember seeing were yellow, red, green, blue, white. as a matter of fact i think all colors of the rainbow were represented! anyway, this fireball was going really fast. it came straight down and looked like it was going to hit my neighbor's roof directly across the driveway from my house when at the last second (about 5-10 feet from the roof) it did a 180 reverse course and shot back up into the sky and disappeared from view. one of the neighbors was outside and saw the same thing. after it happened i said "wow!" loudly. the neighbor heard me and said "whay was that?" i said in a matter of fact way, "a ufo."
content.summary: Fireball almost hit roof!

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting occurred over my southern facing home in southwest fort worth near benbrook lake in the early morning hours at 7:45 am central standard time on december 10, 2010 (i confirmed the date and time by reviewing my text message to a friend with whom i shared the experience). i was rolling out the garbage bins for friday morning pick-up and the triangular shaped craft, with 3 soft glowing well defined lights beneath, was moving very slowly at a diagonal from my right to the left with no sound. i am accustomed to seeing aircraft which originate from or travel toward carswell, afb; however, this craft was on a trajectory outside of the usual flight paths i've witnessed.

the shape of the craft was distinguishable as a dark silhouette against the background of the early morning sky, and the 3 equally proportioned lights were the dominant feature. at a higher altitude, there was a military fighter aircraft too small to identify, but was still audible. i watched for about 2 minutes, as the craft grew closer and eventually passed directly overhead. i looked to my left and saw a neighbor in the car about 3 houses down; however, this person was not a co-witness. i remained in place and continued to watch. in the time i looked left again, toward my neighbor's moving car, the craft disappeared in a blink. my initial thought was that in a clear blue sky, i should be able to reacquire the craft, as there was no way a conventional aircraft could have disappeared so suddenly. the sky was cloudless, my view was unobstructed. i was unable to take a picture at that moment, but have discovered a photo that fits the description, the time of day and similar weather conditions under which i witnessed the ufo.
content.summary: Triangle shaped vehicle, 3 huge lights beneath floating overhead at low altitude...Very silent.

content.detailedDescription: It was new years night i was around the campfire with my cat i looked up into the sky and there was a blinding egg like shape coming towards me then in a instant i was beamed into a very bright room with an alien face looking down at me its eyes were wide no visible nose the mouth was oval with small pointed teeth they then went over to a near by table where my cat was mutilated in front of me they then went over to me with a long tube with a softball sized ball at the end at the other end was a blinking device they then perceded to stick it up my rectum and inserted the device then everything gets fuzzy i wake with a headache and a sore rectum my cat was missing i then heared a beeping noise from inside my head then slowly over ten days began to remember this encounter the beeping has not stopped and my cat is still gone im terribly distaught please help.
content.summary: Blinding egglike shape

content.detailedDescription:
Jan. 8th, 2011-saturday  8:22 pm
my sister and i had to go around to the back side of the target- pier 1 shopping strip mall on us 40 in plainfield indiana. i had bought heavy rugs from the pier 1 store and the sales person was going to meet us at the back door to make loading my car easier. 
 
while driving behind the mall to get to pier 1 back loading door, my sister and i, without any doubt, saw a bright star like object flying west-we were looking south. plainfield indiana is somewhat close to the indianapolis in���t airport, so anything flying to the west would not be unusual. 

because it was familiar, the very bright white star-like shape caught my attention. we pulled into the logan���s restaurant parking lot to get a better view, the time was 8:22pm the moving  "star-like object" came to a complete stop and then moved the opposite direction- left (east) in an swooping  movement- and then it moved right again (west)-it then stopped and remained stationary for a time.

a second smaller "star" followed shortly after at 8:42pm. by 8:49 it was putting  on a show for us.  side to side, climbing up, and then down for as long as we would watch -it had a "floating", "effortless" feel when observing it. i have set criteria for myself in trying to be accurate in determining that what i am seeing is not a planet, or truly a star etc. the very obvious and unusual back and forth, up and down movement from the two ���star like��� objects certainly fulfilled my rule.

i had been to the same area,the same time, on nov. 8th, 2010(t.J.Maxx store parking lot- i was facing south), i again noticed a bright white star object. the star object follow me in mu car from one end of a parking lot across the street (changing directions from looking at it in the south- east, to after it moved, i had to view it by looking west). i literally saw it make "snake-like" movements from one location to another (details to follow in reports)-needless to say i was terrified.

i would assume my sister and i have had more "sightings" and experiences lately than the average person. experiences that have been witnessed by my husband who is a medical doctor, my 16 yr.Old son, two of my nieces, and two of my close friends who are educated researchers.

i will be grateful for mufon���s expertise to help me gain insight on what is currently happening to my family.
content.summary: 1-8-11 saw two star-like objects in plainfield indiana.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend was outside on our porch smoking a cigarette and looking at the moon. when i noticed a bright light and then black and then two more bright lights in the back flying low at first i thought it was a plane bot it had no sound, and it was to big to not have sound it was so strange even two of my kids asked what it was we saw it flew in straight path not rising like a plane i felt a little afraid and happy at the same time this lasted for about 5 mins i was so at aw i could not take my eyes off of it. i just want to know do we have any big planes that can fly that low for that long and be so silent and have three big bright light facing downward.
content.summary: Three bright lights moving slow and silent a perfect triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my vehicle waiting for someone to come pick up a vehicle from our impound yard and i was watching a bright light move across the southern sky at about 1000 msl and maybe 1 or so miles away. it would travel one way then the other maybe 90' or so. did not think much but i began to notice it didn't have any nav lights, beacons or strobes and i found that odd. it traveled at aprox. 120-200 knots, about what i would expect of a aircraft. we are close to felts field but the tower was closed at this time and it was not in the pattern or even close and it was not on approach to spokane int or fairchild afb. i had my cell phone camera and decided to take about 20 pictures. i forgot about them then the other day i looked at them and noticed a object above the bright light. it seems to take several different forms and changes form. i realized my phone was a video also and took a video and in the video, on frame by frame play only you can see the object go behind the bright light then back which you could not see at normal speed. also you can hear the sound of what sounds like a jet aircraft but during this all i heard nothing. i did have my truck running during most of the time which would have covered any sounds but when i turned it off i don't recall any sounds. i have a extensive aviation background, could fly before i could drive, lived on a airport, father is a retired 747 pilot, i know aircraft and this was not any type known to myself. i don't have any idea what it is and i find it  very interesting, whatever it is?
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a bright light that seemed odd  and when i looked at pictures i noticed the strange object.

content.detailedDescription: Mother and sister driving down sierra high way in canyon country california they saw a huge triangle ship  with lights on the side they claimed to be able to make out a triangle outline.
content.summary: Huge trianglee with lights on each on the 3 sides . low quiet

content.detailedDescription: On january 8th, 2011 while working a security post in ok i was observing work being done on a crane. while i was watching a small silver dot appeared. the object was over the weight side of the crane about 10 degrees. the object shape started as a small circle, then while moving it appeard to change to 2 teardrop connected at the small end. when it was about half way across the horizon it seemed to change to a more rectangle shape. when it reached the futherest part behind my vehicle it sped up and then disappeared. i believe it to be a great distance from my location, the speed was a constant high rate of speed, absolutly no noise, no contrail. i see jet airliners, small planes and helicopters all the time. i was first surprised by seeing the object mainly because i had been watching the work on the crane for most of the day. the whole event was a total of less than 30 seconds. my training is observe and report, and to be detailed in all accounts. i did not have a camera with me at the time. i am looking for a explaination for what i saw and if anyone else has seen it.
content.summary: Small circle, changed to 2 teardrops connected then to a rectangle.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 5 a.M. on january 6, 2011, i went to the kitchen for a glass of water.  i glanced out the window and saw the aircraft just above the tree line.  i ran for my glasses and called for my 22 yr. old daughter who was visiting to come see.  there was a row of lights that changed from blue to red.  this is the same aircraft i previously saw in october 2010, when i gave a detailed drawing to the mufon investigator.  

a large triangular craft is the tr-3b. we live on top of a mountain in rural country, giving us a great view of the night sky.  we see lots of aircraft.  jacksonville afb is south of us by 40+ miles driving. 

this time the aircraft was at an approximate altitude of 1500ft moving on a westerly heading at a steady speed. i got dressed and grabbed my keys and headed out following along hwy 25 heading toward quitman and then on to guy, where i lost sight of it as it went out of my sightline!  

the last time i saw it in october 2010...It was moving just above a hover...Not so this time.  no good video this time, though i had grabbed my video camera and regular camera.

the first time i saw it, the weather was clear with little wind.  this time, the area over us was clear with little or no wind, but there were clouds to the west on the horizon. 

again, i was so excited, not fearful or anxious.  i keep hoping my husband will be home when i see it next!

i don't mind if the previous mufon investigator contacts me, again.
content.summary: Looked out the kitchen window, to the west, right above the treeline was the triangular aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
It was dec 14th a typical cold mich night i came outside to meet a family member who was dropping off a down payment for a t-shirt order i do costume designs and i while i stood outside waiting for them to pull up i noticed a really fast object to my right darting by in the sky i thought it was odd something like a shooting star etc not sure because it shoot by so fast so it caught my attention and made me extremely alert and i immediately began to comb the night sky in search for anything strange or sudden movements etc, it wasn't alot of stars visible that night but a few none the less so as i was doing my observation another object caught my eye it appeared to be a bright star much more brighter then anything else in the night sky besides the moon is much smaller then the moon, so as i paid closer attention to that particular object which i assumed was a star i noticed it starting to flicker and make some slight movements and change colors from bright white to a darker blue then a reddish color so i was shocked and excited by my discover and i waited and watched this object about another 2 mins before for my family member pulls up and i proceeded to observe this object as i walked from my front yard where i was standing to the drive way about 10-15 feet from where i was standing in my yard i got in his car got the down payment and instructions for his t-shirt order all while keeping a close eye on this object. i was in the car talking and watching the night sky for about 3-5 mins then i departed from his vehicle and to my surprise the object which appeared to be a bright star changing colors and making slight movements up and down was still visible from my yard so i rushed into the house grabbed my video recorder and came back outside this time i approached the drive way to get a better angle and clear shoot with my camera and then proceeded to start shooting as much as i could. now at this point im outside  standing in the freezing mich weather filming what i thought was a strange star and it wasnt till after i zoomed in closer on the object i was able to witness something i never seen before in my life. now this bright star had morphed from one bright light into two distinct points of light two different colors and they started to make movements like two orbs colliding and dividing separating and joining again changing patterns and growing in size. i observed the erratic activity for several mins then something else stranger began to happen the one star or orb multiplexed and grew from two points of ligt to 3 then 4 then ultimately 8 to 12 different orbs was seen at one time or another they increased in colors as the patterns and movements became more rapid and more complex in directions they all seemed to move as one unit flashing and changing colors and and going from one to several at speeds of light they would move so fast and jump out of frame and then come back into my frame even when i tried to zoom out i could only see one object that appeared to be flickering then when i zoom in again it would start to build up and make more balls of light or multiply in size and grow bigger and became more evasive in this movements it seemed precise and deliberate all tho i couldn't determine what i was actually filming it was definitely rare and unique to me i stayed and observed it for around 15 mins or so before the freezing cold forced me inside to retreat. i went inside to warm up and charge my battery and decided to go back outside after around 20 mins or so and captured similar activity in segments of 13 15 mins for a total of 40 mins to a hour the object was visible around the 4th segment of me coming back out to capture more footage it moved out the reach of my cam and i wasn't able to record anymore. im attaching a few still shoots from the actual video footage and a link to some of the video footage i i i up loading to youtube i also have more footage if your interested. let me know im curious to have a expert analyze my recording and get some answers.            

here is the link of some of the footage i captured that night: 
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Very unique exp, i was totally amazed by the footage i captured that night never seen anything like it in my life.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother in-law, his grandson and a friend noticed a strange phenomenon off the dirt road on his mother's ranch in western tehama county.  they lease parts of the ranch to other cattlemen for grazing.  the clay soils are saturated due to all the rain we've been having the week before but he had never seen anything like this on the isolated gated property.  it looked like the beef cows had run in a compacted oval-shaped ring long and hard enough to create a one foot trench around it until finally being able to leave it. (the cows were quietly grazing the hills by the time they got out there). they checked the area and found no tire tracks, no holes in or out of the circle, no evidence of being fed hay or some other feed that would bring them in so closely, and no other areas of disturbed ground. they took no pictures. we are due for rain later in this week. 
have you ever heard of anything like this? 

i used to have contacts with many mufon people in the past and don't know if any one i know is still with you.
content.summary: Phenomenon re: cattle; not a ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Coming north on i-17 from peoria to anthem, i saw a very bright light north of me.  i continued to see it......It appeared not to be moving.  as i exited the freeway, the ufo came closer and went in the same direction i was going.  it got a bit ahead of me, but i could see it was going to fly over my house.  i got to the driveway, jumped out of the car and ran to my back yard.  the ufo was still close enough to see it's underside.  it was square, with a single white light at each corner. it looked a little like a lego brick.  the light that was coming from the top of it was so bright i couldn't see any shape.  the ufo made no noise.  i estimate it was at an altitude that a commercial jet would be on  approach for a landing. i watched it go south and then lost it.

this morning mon./10/2011) i woke up at 6:00am as i usually do, looked at the clock and went back to sleep.  i had a dream.  i was with a group of people and we were all looking at something in the sky.  it looked like a huge kite.  it was whispy, with streamers coming off it.  we were seeing it from the side.  the color was a deep pink/dusty rose.  then it turned and came towards us.  it was now facing us.  it looked like it had 2 paralle cylinder type sides.  it was rectangle shaped and very lace-like and whispy 
in the center.  while we were looking at it. i heard a tune and words.  the words were, "happy christian(s) coming, jesus christ is coming."  i felt no emotion during the dream. when i woke up, i didn't feel any emotions different from usual.  the tune and the words have been with me all day.  i have never had anything close to this experience before.  i have recently had sitings, but this felt different.
content.summary: Ufo flies over house

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on rt 90 in lake county. i am about a mile to the rt 44 exit when i look up and see two bright lights over the tree line to the left of me. i notice three beams of light coming from each bright light pointing to the ground and one light beaming directly into the sky from its center. i knew there was three lights although i couldn't see the third because of the three beams of light pointing down. on my way back down the highway about 25 min later  i looked for it again and it was gone.
content.summary: Bright lights over the high way with 3 beams up light down and one beam of light up

content.detailedDescription: Walked out the back door to check on *(name deleted--cms/sg) who was out in the barn feeding. happened to look up and there was this circle in the north east sky going around and around counterclockwise. cloud cover was medium. it seemed to be very close to our farm. i went to get gary and we watched it. we could see no light tail coming from the ground. we thought maybe it was a spot light but is was above the lower clouds and we could not see any light trail going through the clouds or coming up from the ground. i tried to take pictures but it did not show up on my 35 mm.It would change circle patterns from more east then go back west.The circle would sometimes have a little blip in it like a stutter. at the end it moved towards the north and got dim. we even called our neighbor to see if he saw the same thing and he did.
content.summary: Circle in the north east sky going around in a circle repeatadly, went counterclockwise

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling south on state road 37 between martinsville and bloomington indiana (approx 7 miles south of martinsville. i noticed what appeared to be the framework (no siding simply the framed structure) of a what appeared to be a building along side the road. it was as large as perhaps a barn. (it is not uncommon for me to check out changes along this segment of highway as i had lived in the area as a child) the i beam framed structure began to lift off the ground in an upward fashion, naturally i slowed down.  i looked for some sort of crane thinking a builder was moving the structure.  there was no crane. the structure lifted off the ground slowly floated off into the sky first above the trees then straight up and out of sight. there was no noise, nor sign of a smoke trail. the speed of the structure was at first slow then fast.

there was another man in a car behind me who also witnessed this event.  i not wanting to think i had been the only one to observe the event stopped the other driver at the stoplight at state road 37 and 46 in bloomington. i ask him what he saw and more importantly what he thought the structure might be.  he discribed his sighting as did i.  we neither one knew each other nor were we able to determine the nature of what we had both witnessed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Square/rectagular looked like an i beam building frame

content.detailedDescription: Driving east towards denver international airport. i saw a metallic bullet shaped thing going slowly west above the circling airplanes. i thought it could be a plane but it was very high up and moving slowly. it seemed to arc towards the north very slowly. as i was watching it a very fast moving bright orb zipped by going east. this flew way faster than any airplane. that on was gone in a flash.  the slow moving one also just vanished out of sight after a few minutes.
content.summary: The first one was bullet like. second one was orb or star-like

content.detailedDescription:
i looked out my window one night and saw this object hovering in the sky as i watched it more closely it started to display odd behaver, moving up and down and side to side. what made it stand out is that it was strobing white and red in a constant fast pace after waiting for a while i noticed it was making its way down past the trees out of my field of vision. this object continued to appear almost every night of september, every night as soon as it was dark this thing was visible it would always start at the same spot in the sky however it would some times move of in a different direction than the previous night. i have gotten several witness to view the object some would say it was a star, even though it would strobe just as much when viewed by others it does seem to slow down its movement when viewed by others., however it would seem to come alive when i would see it alone. it would start by rocking or swaying back and forth for a minute an d then steadily it's self at a certain spot in the sky and then make a straight line right to left and then when it got to a specific point it would stop and then it appeared to
waddle back to the point it started. i tried to get a police man to witness this object but hew refused to come in to my house and said that in 10 years on the force he has never been called to observe a ufo. the next night i got out on my roof and took several pictures of the object with every setting i could and used a star for a point of reference while taking tease pictures i had to witnesses waiting the object and tiring to plot its location with a google star chart while talking to my friend who lives a few blocks away mas waiting the same object from his front door with the cameras' lens  almost fully extended i could see this object perfectly clear with no light flashing it was a plain low or flat gloss metal spear white on visible marks or detail what so ever but when i would zoom out or look with the naked eye it was flashing red and while light. 
    i watched this thing almost every night in september but in october november and december it could not be seen.However as i walked out of my house on december 15th around (.35-940p.M. i saw a huge triangle shaped craft pass over me. i could not tell if the object was going on a straight path when i noticed it or of it was hovering over my house before i came out,but as i was going to my car i stopped to watch this massive black ship pass over head it seemed to be as big as a cargo plain or bigger. i could make out the shape from directly underneath  as well as see the back of the ship and there was no means of propoltion, it was gust a simple shape it made no noise that i could tell and moved about 35mph. it had three lights two in the fear on each rear corner that where approx 10ft. round and 4 to 5 feet at the center. all three lights where not very bright and seemed to be soft and or matte in finish. 
     january 1st 2011 the orb was back, until then i was not able to see it but in october someone caught the orb on tape and put it on you-tube.
 visible the jan 1-3 and then not visible for cloudy overcast for a few days  
 but again on the 7th and 8th. on the 8th i gathered several witnesses to view the object however the few neighbors i could gather where not very interested to stand out side and watch this light in the sky that was surprisingly visible from the street. my brother-in-law brought his two kids to observe the orb from the street and from my second story window although it was visible it did not display the same unearthly strange movements as it had in the past however it still moved up an d down and side to side while staying in a very small area in the sky. closer to 8pm the object started to wander downwards into the trees and then started moving straight up and slowly down several times after observing for about 25 min my brother in law left and as soon as he did the sphere started to move around left to right and up and down very fast! i called him on the cellphone and told him and he said i know i can see it! but i'm blocking traffic so i gotta go!
 
     i decided to call david macdonald and john bacon to tell them of this real time sighting and asked if ether of them could come witness this even though they could not however i had john on the line explaining to him what the object was doing when i noticed it started to drift more and more to the right until it was directly in the flight path of air traffic while this was happening a helicopter passed by the object approximatively 8 to 10 times however the air plains had to at first go far right to fly around the object,(there left) and as it moved further to the right the plains started to fly to the far left! coming almost directly over my house to avoid this orb! one plain had to pull up hard and fly directly over the object. as i told john the (helicopter) that i saw fly by this thing had no flash beacon, it only had one solid light, and i thought that odd yet i assumed this craft to be a helicopter because i could here the rotors and i could see them circle each other low around the city off in the distance before they would take turns doing a fly by,every few minutes another helicopter would fly directly in the path of this object and get very close but the sphere was unphased by this as it just appeared to see what would happen. usually after the sphere starts to wander off it does not come back however this time it did around 10:45-11:00pm the sphere was back hovering over the tree where it usually is except it is off to the right a little. 
    at approx. 11.Pm a new craft came up from the north on the far left from out of the clouds i could hear helicopter rotors very faintly however this craft only had one solid white light and was almost even but a little higher than the orb possibly a quarter-mile between the to objects. the orbs' movements very stubble yet the other craft seemed to have trouble keeping steady for about 15-20 min. however as i checked on them both every one in a while through the net approx. 2hrs the craft on the left stopped moving around and started to behave like the orb.They where both hovering ether waiting each other or both of them together were waiting something else. i saw a ufo last night on the side of the expressway and when i spotted it it moved across the road over me and it continued south a little to the left of i-75going about 80-85mph 5-800 ft off the ground and i saw two more lights in the sky come toward me from a sw direction as i pulled in to a gas station to get a better look and get my camera the first one disappeared however i saw an other while light coming from the same direction but further back it moved very slow and as i watched it come closer it to just disappeared just a little closer than the first one.
content.summary: Red and white orb visible from my house every night in september and jan 1,2,3,6,and the 8th.

content.detailedDescription:
I work nightshift, and leave work at 2:20 a.M., with a 20 minute drive home, and on monday night/tuesday morning 01/04/11 at 2:45 a.M., i and my riding/work partner had just arrived home, and were walking to the front door of our apartment building. 
i had just lit a cigarette, and was walking slowly, looking at the stars. my partner had gone on into the building, and as i stepped up to the sw corner of the building, i looked sw at venus/mars, quite bright in the low wsw sky, then east at the big dipper, and as i turned back towards the west, i noticed a narrow line of clouds, extending back to the ssw, and a dark angular object, slowly coming out of the clouds.
as i watched, it became more visible, and had two bright white lights on the bottom in front, and multiple dimmer lights further back.
then, from directly below the object, a spotlight shined straight up from the ground, at the object, and it made an immediate and very fluid turn to it's left, 180 degrees and went back into the clouds.
i was given a full view of the entire bottom of the object, against the white cloud, which was illuminated by the lights of the town.
it was approximately 1/4 mile away, or 6-7 city blocks, dark-colored, and triangular, with the points of the triangle squared off. there were two bright lights on each point, on either side, with a dimmer, hazy ring of about 12-15 lights around the center.
the turn this thing made was impossibly tight and fluid, and it quickly disappeared back into the cloud, out of sight. there was no sound at all while this event occured. 
as i had been watching it, i had backed up to the front door of the apartment building door, and called to my partner to come and see the object, but by the time he had come out, the object was no longer visible, and the spotlight was turned off, so he saw nothing.
we stood there for another 20 minutes, scanning the sky, but saw nothing further, and finally went in.
i immediately drew a diagram of the event, which i will attempt to send, and made a report to the national ufo reporting center. it was suggested that i also contact this organization with the details, which i am doing now.
content.summary: 2:50 a.M. tue. 01/04/11 vincennes, in triangular ufo against white clouds; full bottom view from approx. 1/4 mile, about 800 ft up.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were sitting on our front porch smoking a cig .
my girlfriend was showing me how she thought the moon looked different because of the upside down finger nail shape. as i was looking up i saw a bright light and black then two more bight lights go over head and one flashing red one it was a perfect triangle silent low flying we watched it go across the sky we could not hear anything it flew on a straight path we watched it for about 5min. a b52 but when they fly over they are loud. it just flew low slow and silent and it was a perfect triangle. shocked and cant fully say mad cause i didnt have my phone. it flew out of sight
content.summary: Three bright lights moving slow and silent

content.detailedDescription:
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

view part 2 of this article and it shows coordinates and buildings blurred out on the moon.
content.summary: Response to discovery of lunar anomaly and location

content.detailedDescription:
First off i am an ex-air force tech - i take the subject of aerial phenomena pretty seriously.

this is a little different...I recently discovered a site run by the us navy that holds the original clementine moon scan

here's the link: 
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

at this site at 19 degrees lat and 166 degrees long. are three enormous structures that we on earth didn't construct. they are huge...The 'castle' like structure measures 3 miles by 12 miles in size....You can even see these on googlemoon.
anyone can see these!!!!  please understand that there is a cover base on the far side of our own moon and nasa and the nsa probably knew.
i have give this over the last two weeks to some politicians and news sources. the head of unsolved mysteries has them now and is working on a special about the subject. i do not feel that good about this discovery........Our space research industry should have brought this to our attention...Not me. judge for yourself
content.summary: Discovery of lunar anomaly and location

content.detailedDescription:
We keep game cameras around our home to capture pictures of the abundant wildlife. we have seen hundreds of pictures of balls of light. in the photos we have seen something that looks like a full moon on nights when their was no moon.

the most interesting thing i have seen is a blue rectangle that apears to be above ground, then on the ground. only to become a circle and return to it's rectangular shape and disappear.

i have attached photos.

there are five pictues in this event, but i only had room for three on this form. it is something to see when all five are shown as a slide show.
content.summary: Blue beam

content.detailedDescription:
Tue. january 4th, 2011   roughly 8:20 pm
                
       my uncle and i were driving toward manheim from lititz, we were heading to mollys gas station. i was driving and noticed some bright lights in the sky, at that time i pointed it out to my uncle. i kinda laughed and said it was a ufo. i keep my eye out from time to time but was not prepared to be witness to what comes next.  as we approach the first bend we are watching this craft hover over some backroad fields, a few farm homes around and many developments within a mile north if not closer. it was only a few football fields away, pulsating peach colored orbs hovered over in front of us. went around bend and watched it through some trees. when we came around the bend next to the pond right in front of doe run elementary school the orbs fell silently towards my vehicle. our windows and sunroof wide open we yelled as i swereved a bit! not paying no mind to the car behind us.  this object acted as though weightless, fell in front of our eyes slowed down about a football field away right above the school, spun as the orbs shined in my windshield,almost blinding but made a silouette of a grey haze against the black night sky. may have been a rounded but triangle shape.  after it slowed down and lights shined in our direction it spun....Horizontally,very fast. then diagonally, like a ball being spun on water by hand.  best yet we then watched it take off in no way i have ever seen anything fly! as if spinning wasnt crazy enough! it silently took off towards the town of manheim and could literally see it fly until it was prob over mtjoy pa in a matter of 20 seconds. right when it took off at top speeds we watched in disbelief as it slithered like a snake in the air, it did not go straight. i stepped on the gas but the time i got a half mile it was long gone from our sight in the distance.  we thought about reporting it but wasnt prepared to tell people this. i thought i would wait and see if anyone else came forward, we thought for sure somebody would but i havent seen anything yet. it is now the 9th.  it changed the way i look at things for sure. i believe i was in shock for the past couple days. i know it sounds crazy but i didnt ask to see this especially right now at this time of my life, but i also feel very lucky and now believe in a larger picture without discrediting any beliefs or opinions. i am now at peace
content.summary: 4 peach colored pulsating orbs over doe run elementary school manheim pa

content.detailedDescription: Took my dogs out and quickly notice the object, then called my wife out to confirm what i was seeing.  large solid red orangeish  color sphere moving in the sky watched for about 3 mins until it was out of sight.  it seemed it climbed up in to the clouds.   cant see the stars tonight due to the clouds. hope this helps.  sorry no pics.
content.summary: Large red orange sphere moving from east to west

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
i was on my back deck taking my dog out.
2. what made you first notice the object?
i seen a very very bright star(i thought it was a star.) above some trees to the north of my house.
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
wow, that star is really bright and it seemed out of place, then i noticed it was move south easterly and it was rising at a 50 degree angle.
4. describe the object and its actions and motions
the object was very bright, much brighter than any star i have every seen.  i was pure white much like a star and it had no sound what so every.  it was a clear night.  when i first saw it i was suprized it was moving and it was moving slow at first.  i then opened our back door and called my wife and yelled, "honey get out here."  the whole time i did not take my eyes off the object.  my wife and oldest son came out they both saw the object by then it was half way across my visable sky.  it was slightly to the east and not directly over head.  it was much brighter as it was closer.  my wife and son both started yelling what is that.  we all noted it did not have flashing lights of any kind and it was a solid color.  as we all stood there in awe, its speed took off faster than ive ever seen a conventional craft move and it look like it pinched out into nothing.  all three of us can atest to that.  
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
i have to say it was very exciting but scary also.  my son and wife also were very excited. we came inside and called my parents and told the story to them.  i have to say i have never seen a aircraft that acted or looked like that.
6. how did you lose sight of the object?
as i stated before it sped up and look like it pinched out.  not at a point that it should have disapeared in the horizon or anything.
content.summary: A large bright object slowly ascended in the sky and took off very fast and blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my three friends and myself home from wal-mart at around one o' clock am. my back window was fogged over, and my friend decided to wipe a bit of the fog away to look at the sky, when she noticed a circular craft above my car.  she described the bottom as having lights.  it followed directly above the vehicle until i pulled into the apartment complex my friend lived in, and the four of us exited the car to watch the ufo hover above the trees across the street.  it was high up, about the normal altitude of an airplane, but it was clear that it wasn't ordinary.  it just..  stayed put, for the most part, and it seemed to gradually get smaller.  i was startled to say the least, and we all went inside after a couple minutes of staring.  we checked the window after we got inside, and it had dissapeared.
content.summary: Circular shape. three lights were visible on the sides as it rotated. slow moving.
